name: pittsburgh-food-trucks
description: Pittsburgh Food Trucks website built with Jekyll

scripts.build: docker-compose run --rm jekyll sh -c 'ruby scripts/fetch-data.rb && bundle exec jekyll build'
scripts.build:prod: JEKYLL_ENV=production docker-compose run --rm jekyll sh -c 'ruby scripts/fetch-data.rb && bundle exec jekyll build'

author: Pittsburgh Food Trucks
